entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2 except high 6 inland.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight.
